_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The support for the continuation of cons: What you have underlying tendencies for
Support for the continuation of consciousness
The consequences of the support for the: Rebirth into a new state of existence in the future
Future rebirth, old age, and death come to be
Sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress come to be
The cessation of the support for the con: Don’t intend or plan or have underlying tendencies
No support for the continuation of consciousness
No rebirth into a new state of existence in the future
Future rebirth, old age, and death cease
Sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
